doc.name: HighlightEntities
doc.description: An attribute that highlights entities with a specified color when you double click on its icon, or when you invoke Configure. To edit its parameters, hold the Alt key while double clicking.
doc.author: Edward A. Lee
doc.property: List of names of the entities to highlight. This is an array of strings that defaults to null, which is interpreted to mean to clear all highlights.
Highlight color. This defaults to yellow.
Label to put in the icon for this object. This is a string that defaults to "HighlightEntities".
